item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：由于勉强持有被冻结的俄罗斯资产，布鲁塞尔清算所的资产负债表已经膨胀。@rebeccawire 认为，这有助于利润和分红，但金融稳定的威胁迫在眉睫。
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: The Brussels-based clearing house has seen its balance sheet swell thanks to the frozen Russian assets it reluctantly holds. That’s helping profits and dividends but that financial stability threats loom, @rebeccawire argues pic.twitter.com/KCrnHcZ9Ep

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 26, 2024

item.title: 观看：中国科技公司荣耀（Honor）最近推出了新款智能手机 Magic 6 Pro，该公司开发了一款眼球跟踪人工智能工具，用户只需注视手机屏幕，就能远程打开和移动汽车。
item.description:

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 26, 2024

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：由于俄罗斯资产被冻结，总部位于布鲁塞尔的中央证券存管机构欧洲清算公司（Euroclear）的税前利润大增，现金堆积如山。@rebeccawire 认为，俄罗斯的任何报复行为都可能威胁其金融稳定。
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: Euroclear, the Brussels-based central securities depository has seen cash piling up thanks to the frozen Russian assets, which have inflated its pre-tax profit. Any retaliation against by Russia could threaten its financial stability, @rebeccawire argues pic.twitter.com/DiNsaYuEOx

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 26, 2024
